bio: Andrew Whelan is an accomplished career coach and small business owner. His background also includes performing at The Second City and Late Night with Conan O'Brien. His results-oriented, growth mindset approach to coaching has helped hundreds of graduates and freelancers achieve professional success. His current coaching focuses on General Assembly immersive students and entrepreneurs, guiding them through their branding and job search.
title: Andrew Whelan, a career coach and small business owner with a performance background, helps General Assembly students and entrepreneurs succeed in branding and job searches.
